overview: Hoping to make it big in the music world, a group of slacker friends quit their jobs and form a multicultural band, much to the dismay of their parents. The bandmates include an African Elvis imitator on guitar, a Chinese cross-dressing drummer, a George Harrison-style hippie and two ex-waitresses as backup singers. The motley crew just might become stars and realize their dreams if they can win a high-profile competition and a trip to America.
title: Don't Stop Dreaming
